text: Lobutcha Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. It is a tributary to the Pearl River. Lobutcha is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean "boiled food" or "to make warm". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Attala County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Choctaw County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Leake County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Winston County, Mississippi Category:Tributaries of the Pearl River (Mississippi–Louisiana)
title: Lobutcha Creek
